channel.title: My IP isn't working?
channel.description:
Okay people. Quick question.
I go to my client folder and I go to my GUI and I search for serverip. I found it, and it said "localhost" so I changed localhost to my IP in " " and I saved it then went back to my client, compiled everything in the source and client. Then I started it up, and its saying error connecting to server?
It worked when I used LocalHost but now It's not working with my IP. I need it to so my friends can play on my server.
Any help?

[/quote]Your a mod. You can lock it yourself…[/quote]
